attributes.action: Demand Justice for Hillsborough and put pressure on the Sun Newspaper to Print a Full Apology on their Front page Condeming Their Lies Bringing Justice for the 96
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A Petition For Justice for the 96 Who lost their Lives at the Hillsborough football Disaster and to bring pressure on the sun newspaper to apologise for the lies and hatred they have shown towards the people of liverpool and bring JUSTICE for the 96

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Demand Justice for Hillsborough and put pressure on the Sun Newspaper to Print a Full Apology on their Front page Condeming Their Lies Bringing Justice for the 96."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14725.asp

Prime Minister's Office
